column6: "END OF HISTORY" PART 2 (OF 4) With the team split in two, the Uncanny X-Men have to face the unbridled force of the Fury on two sides of the globe! Will the Fury's "divide-and-conquer" plan prove to be the X-Men's ultimate undoing?
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | colorist:Frank D'Armata | inker:Mark Farmer
